sentences: Oli hea kohtumine, seega näeme uuesti!
See on huvitav teave, seega võibolla peaksime seda uurima.
context: Seega is an Estonian conjunctive adverb that connects ideas and indicates consequence or conclusion. It's similar to English 'therefore', 'so', or 'thus' in meaning. The word can be used at the beginning of sentences (seega...) or within sentences as a connector between clauses, showing that what follows logically results from what was previously mentioned.
